Title: Elegant Strapless Evening Dress with Train

----

Sku: KD032

Category: evening, formal-gowns

Featured-image: KD032-print-elegant-strapless-evening-dress-with-train_p.jpg

----

Description: A nude gown is overlaid with a tulle layer that is appliqued with satin cords of two colors. The black and white striping adds a zebra print look to the silhouette. The A-line gown is a V-neck with a high waisted look. The back of the gown is a low V and accents the gown.
